SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.controller

Klasse AllFinishedTreatmentController

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.controller.AllFinishedTreatmentController
public class AllFinishedTreatmentController extends Object
The AllFinishedTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the finished treatment view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AllFinishedTreatmentController

      public AllFinishedTreatmentController()

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      When initialize() gets called, all fields are already initialized. For example from the FXMLLoader after loading an FXML-File. At this point of the lifecycle of the Controller, the fields can be accessed and configured.

    • readAllAndShowInTableView

      public void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      Reloads all finished treatments to the table by clearing the list of all finished treatments and filling it again by all persisted finished treatments, delivered by FinishedTreatmentDao.

    • handleComboBox

      public void handleComboBox()
      Handles the selection event of the patient combo box. Based on the selected patient name from the combo box, this method either: - Loads all finished treatments if "alle" ("all") is selected, or - Loads only the finished treatments for the selected patient. The method clears the current list of finished treatments and repopulates it based on the selection. Patient lookup is done via searchInList() using the selected surname. Assumes: the patient list is already populated and that surnames are unique or sufficiently distinguishable.

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete()
      This method handles events fired by the button to delete finished treatments. It calls FinishedTreatmentDao to delete the finished treatments from the database and removes the object from the list, which is the data source of the TableView.

    • handleMouseClick

      public void handleMouseClick()
      Handles mouse click events on the treatment table view. Registers a listener that detects double-clicks on table rows. When a row is double-clicked and a treatment is selected, the corresponding Treatment object is retrieved from the finishedTreatments list based on the selected index, and a detailed treatment window is opened via treatmentWindow(). Assumes: the finishedTreatments list is in sync with the table view's displayed items.

    • treatmentWindow

      public void treatmentWindow(Treatment treatment)
      Opens a new window displaying the details of a selected finished treatment. Loads the FinishedTreatmentView.fxml layout, initializes its controller with the provided Treatment object, and displays the view in a modal window (blocking the current window until closed).
      Parameter:
      treatment - the Treatment object to display in the new window Note: The main application window remains in the background, and the new window is non-resizable.
